About.paragraph: Kitty Kads NFTS are the first limited NFT collection on Kadena and helped kick off the initial NFT wave on Kadena.
About.paragraph2: There are 10,000 original Gen 0s and 5,000 Gen1s that can be traded.
About.paragraph3: Feel free to buy one and be part of the memory.

Highlights.name: 10,000 Gen 0s
Highlights.text: These are the OG kitties and the first limited NFT collection on Kadena!

Highlights.name: 5,000 Gen 1s
Highlights.text: Created by breeding Gen 0s, these share the features of their parents.

Highlights.name: 5k KDA Fund
Highlights.text: 5,000 KDA is set aside for buy backs and community promotions

Highlights.name: Rarity
Highlights.text: No two Gen0 kitties are the same, which also means some kitties are more rare and coveted

Highlights.name: 3% Trade Fees
Highlights.text: To prevent artifical price hikes, a 3% trade fee will be taken from all sales

Roadmap.title: Gen 0 Mint (Done)
Roadmap.text: All 10,000 Gen 0s were minted and sold out

Roadmap.title: Breeding (Done)
Roadmap.text: 5,000 kitties were sucessfully bred by the community

Roadmap.title: Trading (Done)
Roadmap.text: Kitties can be traded here or on arkade.fun

Roadmap.title: Fun Game (Done)
Roadmap.text: Fun game feature kitties to pass the fud on fudsurvivor.kittykad.com

Tokenomics.title: 10,000 Gen 0s
Tokenomics.text: These are the OG kitties and the first limited NFT collection on Kadena!

Tokenomics.title: 5,000 Gen 1s
Tokenomics.text: Created by breeding Gen 0s, these share the features of their parents.

Tokenomics.title: Prizes and Whitelists
Tokenomics.text: Part of the Gen 0 slots will be reserved for prize and whitelist winners

Tokenomics.title: 3% Trade Fees
Tokenomics.text: To prevent fake price pumps, a trade fee is applied to all sales. All profits go directly to cat foundations

Socials.link: Fair launch will happen across DEX's on the Kadena ecosystem

Socials.title: NFTs - Q1 '22
Socials.text: Cat themed NFTs coming to the Kadena blockchain

Socials.title: Games and Dapps - Q2 '22
Socials.text: Community themed games and dapps linked to the Kitty Kad token

Socials.title: Cross-chain - H2 '22
Socials.text: Via Kadena's bridges, the token will be available on more chains to allow more users to join

Projects.title: Token Price Tracker
Projects.text: Tool that tracks the price of tokens native to Kadena

Projects.title: FUD Survivor
Projects.text: Play with Kitty Kad to survive the fud!
